meanings.definition: People who habitually agree or assent.
meanings.sent1: The yeasayers in the group always nod in agreement.
meanings.sent2: The yeasayers quickly approved the new proposal.
meanings.sent3: The yeasayers were like a chorus of agreement, never disagreeing.
meanings.sent4: Among the team, she stood out as the chief yeasayer, always supporting ideas.
meanings.sent5: The yeasayers' constant nods made them known as the agreeable bunch.

meanings.definition: Those who are inclined to say yes or approve.
meanings.sent1: She was known as one of the yeasayers, always saying yes to everything.
meanings.sent2: The yeasayers were happy to give their approval to the plan.
meanings.sent3: The yeasayers seemed to have a 'yes' button permanently pressed.
meanings.sent4: In the meeting, he was the loudest yeasayer, supporting every suggestion.
meanings.sent5: The yeasayers' positive attitude made them a joy to work with.
